name: Ext_R3_Appointment_pa_required
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.Appointment.participant.required for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents Appointment.participant.required from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Appointment|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R5.

element.definition: Is this participant required to be present at the meeting. This covers a use-case where 2 doctors need to meet to discuss the results for a specific patient, and the patient is not required to be present.
element.comment: `Appointment.participant.required` maps to R5 `Appointment.participant.required`. Has no type mapping `required` removed the required value set binding to `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/participantrequired|4.3.0`. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.definition: Is this participant required to be present at the meeting. This covers a use-case where 2 doctors need to meet to discuss the results for a specific patient, and the patient is not required to be present.
element.comment: `Appointment.participant.required` maps to R5 `Appointment.participant.required`. Has no type mapping `required` removed the required value set binding to `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/participantrequired|4.3.0`. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: Is the Participant required to attend the appointment.
